element.hint: Individuals at this level have a fundamental understanding of the skill but may require guidance and supervision to perform tasks effectively.
element.label: Basic

element.hint: Individuals at this level have a high degree of proficiency and can handle complex tasks with ease, often demonstrating advanced techniques or strategies.
element.label: Skilled

element.hint: This level represents mastery of the skill, where individuals have extensive experience and knowledge, and can provide guidance, leadership, and innovative solutions in their area of expertise.
element.label: Expert

element.hint: At this level, individuals have progressed beyond the basics and can perform tasks independently with a reasonable level of skill and understanding.
element.label: Competent

element.hint: This level indicates a solid proficiency in the skill, where individuals can perform tasks confidently and effectively in most situations.
element.label: Proficient
